parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application that generates the output stream. You can view the application name on the [Primary/Secondary Stream Mixing Settings](~~606583~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description:
The streaming protocol. Valid values:

*   **rtmp**: This is the default value.
*   **rtc**

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the output stream. You can view the stream name on the [Primary/Secondary Stream Mixing Settings](~~606583~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.
